 2154: econnreset_after_sync_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2155:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2156:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2157:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2158:                             Addr;
 2159:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2160:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2161:                     end
 2162:            end,
 2163:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_sync_send(Config, Addr) end,
 2164:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2165:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2166: 
 2167: do_econnreset_after_sync_send(Config, Addr) ->
 2168:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2169:     ?P("test with option switched off (default)"),
 2170:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2171:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2172:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2173: 			   [{active,          false},
 2174: 			    {show_econnreset, false},
 2175: 			    {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2176:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2177:                      CSock;
 2178:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2179:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2180:         end,
 2181:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2182:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2183:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2184:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 2185:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2186:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, true}]),
 2187:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, "Whatever"),
 2188:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client, closed),
 2189:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, false}]),
 2190: 
 2191:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2192:     ?P("test with option explicitly switched on"),
 2193:     {ok, L1}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2194:     {ok, Port1} = inet:port(L1),
 2195:     Client1 =
 2196:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port1,
 2197:                       [{active,          false},
 2198:                        {show_econnreset, true},
 2199:                        {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2200:             {ok, CSock1} ->
 2201:                 CSock1;
 2202:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 2203:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 2204:         end,            
 2205:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L1),
 2206:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L1),
 2207:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2208:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 2209:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2210:     %% {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:send(Client1, "Whatever"),
 2211:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client1, econnreset),
 2212:     ?P("done"),
 2213:     ok.
 2214: 
 2215: 
 2216: ecr_ass_send(Config, Sock, Expected) ->
 2217:     case os:type() of
 2218: 	{win32, nt} ->
 2219: 	    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 2220: 		true ->
 2221: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 2);
 2222: 		false ->
 2223: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2224: 	    end;
 2225: 	_ ->
 2226: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2227:     end.
 2228: 
 2229: do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N) when (N > 0) ->
 2230:     case gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Whatever") of
 2231: 	{error, Expected} ->
 2232: 	    ?P("[~w] expected send result", [N]),
 2233: 	    ok;
 2234: 	{error, Unexpected} ->
 2235: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send error: "
 2236: 	       "~n   Expected:   ~p"
 2237: 	       "~n   Unexpected: ~p", [N, Expected, Unexpected]),
 2238: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1);
 2239: 	ok ->
 2240: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send success", [N]),
 2241: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1)
 2242:     end;
 2243: do_ecr_ass_send(_Sock, _Expected, _) ->
 2244:     error.
 2245:

 2247: econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2248:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2249:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2250:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2251:                             Addr;
 2252:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2253:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2254:                     end
 2255:            end,
 2256:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) end,
 2257:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2258:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2259: 
 2260: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) ->
 2261:     {OS, _}         = os:type(),
 2262:     IsSocketBackend = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2263:     CPayload        = craasa_mk_payload(),
 2264:     SPayload        = "Whatever",
 2265: 
 2266:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2267:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2268:     {Client1, Server1} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2269: 
 2270:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2271:     {ok, Sender1} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, default,
 2272:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2273:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2274:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2275: 
 2276:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2277:     ok = inet:setopts(Server1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2278:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2279:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2280:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2281:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2282: 
 2283:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2284:     craasa_verify(default, Client1, SPayload),
 2285: 
 2286:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2287:     craasa_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2288: 
 2289:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2290:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2291:     {Client2, Server2} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2292: 
 2293:     ?P("populate 2 (true)"),
 2294:     {ok, Sender2} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, true,
 2295:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2296:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2297:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2298: 
 2299:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2300:     ok = inet:setopts(Server2, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2301:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2302:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2303:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2304:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2305: 
 2306:     ?P("verify 2 (true)"),
 2307:     craasa_verify(true, Client2, SPayload),
 2308: 
 2309:     ?P("cleanup 2 (true)"),
 2310:     craasa_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2311: 
 2312:     ?P("done"),
 2313:     ok.
 2314: 
 2315: craasa_mk_payload() ->
 2316:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2317: 
 2318: craasa_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2319:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2320:     ?P("create listen socket (server) with active = false"),
 2321:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false},
 2322:                                      {recbuf, 4096},
 2323:                                      {ip,     Addr}]),
 2324:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2325:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2326:     Opts = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2327:               is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2328:            end,
 2329:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2330:                            [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++ Opts) of
 2331:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2332:                      CSock;
 2333:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2334:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2335:         end,
 2336:     ?P("create accept socket (server)"),
 2337:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2338:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2339:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2340:     {Client, S}.
 2341: 
 2342: craasa_populate(OS, _ISB, _EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2343:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2344:     ?P("send payload (~w bytes) from client to server", [byte_size(CPayload)]),
 2345:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2346:     ?P("verify client socket queue size"),
 2347:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2348: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2349: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2350: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2351:     end,
 2352:     ?P("[server] send something"),
 2353:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2354:     {ok, undefined};
 2355: craasa_populate(OS, ISB,
 2356: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2357:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2358:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2359:                       end,
 2360:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2361:                                 craasa_populate_sender(
 2362: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2363: 				     true                       -> 1
 2364: 				  end,
 2365: 				  Client,
 2366: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2367: 				  CPayload)
 2368:                         end),
 2369:     receive
 2370:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2371:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2372:     after 2000 ->
 2373:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2374:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2375:             {ok, Sender}
 2376:     end.
 2377: 
 2378: craasa_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2379:     ?P("[socket, ~w] send payload (expect failure ~p)",
 2380:        [N, ExpectedSendReason]), 
 2381:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2382:         {error, ExpectedSendReason} ->
 2383:             ?P("[socket, ~w] expected payload send failure", [N]), 
 2384:             exit(normal);
 2385:         {error, UnexpectedSendReason} ->
 2386:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send failure: "
 2387: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, UnexpectedSendReason]), 
 2388: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2389: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload);
 2390: 	ok ->
 2391:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send success", [N]), 
 2392: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2393: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload)
 2394:     end;
 2395: craasa_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2396:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2397: 
 2398: craasa_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2399:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2400:     craasa_cleanup(Sender).
 2401: 
 2402: craasa_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2403:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2404:     receive
 2405:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2406:             ok
 2407:     after 0 ->
 2408:             ok
 2409:     end;
 2410: craasa_cleanup(_) ->
 2411:     ok.
 2412: 
 2413: craasa_verify(default, Client, Payload) ->
 2414:     ?P("[verify-default] client await server data"),
 2415:     receive
 2416: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2417:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2418:                "client received expected server data - "
 2419:                "now await socket closed"),
 2420: 	    receive
 2421: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2422:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2423:                        "received client socket closed"),
 2424: 		    ok;
 2425: 		Other1 ->
 2426:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2427:                        "awaiting client socket closed - received upexpected: "
 2428:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2429: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2430: 	    end;
 2431: 	Other2 ->
 2432:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2433:                "awaiting client socket data - received upexpected: "
 2434:                "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2435: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other2})
 2436:     end;
 2437: craasa_verify(true, Client, Payload) ->
 2438:     ?P("[verify-true] client await server data"),
 2439:     receive
 2440: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2441:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2442:                "client received expected server data - now await socket error"),
 2443: 	    receive
 2444: 		{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2445:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2446:                        "client received expected socket error - "
 2447:                        "now await socket closed"),
 2448: 		    receive
 2449: 			{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2450:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2451:                                "client received expected socket closed"),
 2452: 			    ok;
 2453: 			Other1 ->
 2454:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2455:                                "client awaiting socket closed - "
 2456:                                "received upexpected: "
 2457:                                "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2458: 			    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2459: 		    end;
 2460: 		Other2 ->
 2461:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2462:                        "client awaiting socket error - received upexpected: "
 2463:                        "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2464: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2465: 	    end;
 2466: 	Other3 ->
 2467:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2468:                "client awaiting socket data - received upexpected: "
 2469:                "~n      ~p", [Other3]),
 2470: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other3})
 2471:     end.
 2472:

 2476: econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2477:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2478:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2479:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2480:                             Addr;
 2481:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2482:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2483:                     end
 2484:            end,
 2485:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2486:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr)
 2487:            end,
 2488:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2489:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2490: 
 2491: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr) ->
 2492:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2493:     {Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload} = craasao_pre(Config, Addr),
 2494: 
 2495:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2496:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2497: 
 2498:     ?P("[ctrl] populate"),
 2499:     {ok, Sender} = craasao_populate(OS, ISB,
 2500: 				    Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload),
 2501: 
 2502:     ?P("[ctrl] set server socket option linger: {true, 0}"),
 2503:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2504:     ?P("[ctrl] close server socket"),
 2505:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 2506:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2507:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2508: 
 2509:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2510:     craasao_verify(OS, ISB, Client, Sender, SPayload),
 2511: 
 2512:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"),
 2513:     craasao_cleanup(Client),
 2514: 
 2515:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2516:     ok.
 2517: 
 2518: craasao_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2519:     ?P("[pre] create listen socket with active = false"),
 2520:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2521:                          [{active, false},
 2522:                           {recbuf, 4096},
 2523:                           {ip,     Addr}]),
 2524:     ?P("[pre] listen socket: "
 2525:        "~n      ~p", [L]),
 2526:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2527:     ?P("[pre] create connect socket (~w)", [Port]),
 2528:     Client     = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2529:                                [{active,          false},
 2530:                                 {sndbuf,          4096},
 2531:                                 {show_econnreset, true},
 2532:                                 {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2533:                      {ok, CSock} ->
 2534:                          ?P("[pre] connect socket created:"
 2535:                               "~n      ~p", [CSock]),
 2536:                          CSock;
 2537:                      {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2538:                          ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2539:                  end,
 2540:     ?P("[pre] create accept socket"),
 2541:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2542:     ?P("[pre] close listen socket"),
 2543:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2544:     {Client, Server, craasao_mk_payload(), "Whatever"}.
 2545: 
 2546: craasao_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2547:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2548:     ?P("[populate,inet] client send data when"
 2549:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2550:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2551:     ok      = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2552:     ?P("[populate,inet] verify client socket queue size"),
 2553:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2554: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2555: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2556: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2557:     end,
 2558:     ?P("[populate,inet] server send data"),
 2559:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2560:     ?P("[populate,inet] sleep some"),
 2561:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2562:     {ok, undefined};
 2563: craasao_populate(OS, ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2564:     ?P("[populate,socket] entry when"
 2565:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2566:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2567:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2568:                                 craasao_populate_sender(
 2569: 				  if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) -> 2;
 2570: 				     true                         -> 1
 2571: 				  end,
 2572: 				  Client, CPayload)
 2573:                         end),
 2574:     receive
 2575:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2576: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2577: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2578:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2579:     after 2000 ->
 2580:             ?P("[populate,socket] send something"),
 2581:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2582:             {ok, Sender}
 2583:     end.
 2584: 
 2585: craasao_populate_sender(N, Client, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2586:     ?P("[populate,sender,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]),
 2587:     ExpectedSendRes = econnreset,
 2588:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2589: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2590: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] expected (payload) send failure", [N]), 
 2591: 	    exit(normal);
 2592: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2593: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected (payload) send failure reason:"
 2594: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2595: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload);
 2596: 	ok ->
 2597: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected send success - "
 2598: 	       "expected failure with ~p", [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2599: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload)
 2600:     end;
 2601: craasao_populate_sender(_, _, _) ->
 2602:     exit(send_failure).
 2603: 
 2604: 
 2605: craasao_mk_payload() ->
 2606:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2607: 
 2608: craasao_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2609: 	       Client, _Sender, _Payload) when is_port(Client) ->
 2610:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2611:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2612:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active: once"),
 2613:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2614:     ?P("[verify] expect client econnreset"),
 2615:     receive
 2616: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2617:             ?P("[verify] received client econnreset -> "
 2618:                "expect client closed message"),
 2619: 	    receive
 2620: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2621:                     ?P("[verify] "
 2622:                        "received expected client closed message - done"),
 2623: 		    ok;
 2624: 		Other1 ->
 2625:                     ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2626:                          "(expected closed): "
 2627:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2628: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2629: 	    end;
 2630: 	Other2 ->
 2631:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2632:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2633:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2634: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2635:     end;
 2636: craasao_verify(OS, ISB,
 2637: 	       Client, Sender, Payload) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2638:     ?P("[verify] begin with"
 2639:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2640:        "~n      Sender: ~p", [Client, Sender]),
 2641:     craasao_verify_sender(Sender),
 2642:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2643:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2644:     Post =
 2645: 	if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 2646: 		"";
 2647: 	   true ->
 2648: 		?P("[verify] set client socket option active once (1)"),
 2649: 		ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2650: 		?P("[verify] client expect data"),
 2651: 		receive
 2652: 		    {tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2653: 			?P("[verify] client received expected data"),
 2654: 			ok
 2655: 		after 10000 ->
 2656: 			?P("[verify] no client payload: "
 2657: 			   "~n   ~p", [messages()]),
 2658: 			ct:fail(no_client_payload)
 2659: 		end,
 2660: 		" (2)"
 2661:     end,
 2662:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active once" ++ Post),
 2663:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2664:     ?P("[verify] await client econnreset"),
 2665:     receive
 2666: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2667:             ?P("[verify] client received expected econnreset -> "
 2668:                "expect socket close message"),
 2669: 	    receive
 2670: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2671: 		    ?P("[verify] client received expected closed message"),
 2672:                     ok;
 2673: 		Other1 ->
 2674: 		    ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2675:                          "(expected closed): "
 2676: 		       "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2677: 		       "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other1, craasao_flush()]),
 2678: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2679: 	    end;
 2680: 	Other2 ->
 2681:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2682:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2683:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2684: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2685:     after 10000 ->
 2686:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected timeout (expected error): "
 2687:                "~n      Flushed: ~p", [craasao_flush()]),
 2688: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_timeout, tcp_error})            
 2689:     end.
 2690: 
 2691: craasao_flush() ->
 2692:     craasao_flush([]).
 2693: 
 2694: craasao_flush(Acc) ->
 2695:     erlang:yield(),
 2696:     receive Msg    -> craasao_flush([Msg|Acc])
 2697:     after     1000 -> lists:reverse(Acc)
 2698:     end.
 2699: 
 2700: craasao_verify_sender(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2701:     ?P("[verify sender] await termination"),
 2702:     receive
 2703:         {'EXIT', Sender, normal} ->
 2704: 	    ?P("[verify sender] expected normal termination received"),
 2705:             ok;
 2706:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2707:             ?P("[verify sender] unexpected termination: "
 2708:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2709: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_sender_termination, Sender, Reason})
 2710:     after infinity ->
 2711:             ok
 2712:     end;
 2713: craasao_verify_sender(_) ->
 2714:     ok.
 2715: 
 2716: craasao_cleanup(Client) ->
 2717:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)).
 2718:

 2722: econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2723:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2724:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2725:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2726:                             Addr;
 2727:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2728:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2729:                     end
 2730:            end,
 2731:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2732:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr)
 2733:            end,
 2734:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2735:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2736: 
 2737: do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 2738:     {OS, _}  = os:type(),
 2739:     ISB      = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2740:     CPayload = craasp_mk_payload(),
 2741:     SPayload = "Whatever",
 2742: 
 2743:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2744:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2745:     {Client1, Server1} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2746: 
 2747:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2748:     {ok, Sender1} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, default,
 2749:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2750: 
 2751:     ?P("close server socket (1)"),
 2752:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2753:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2754:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2755: 
 2756:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2757:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client1, default, SPayload),
 2758: 
 2759:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2760:     craasp_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2761: 
 2762:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2763:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2764:     {Client2, Server2} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2765: 
 2766:     ?P("populate 2 (default)"),
 2767:     {ok, Sender2} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, true,
 2768:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2769: 
 2770: 
 2771:     ?P("close server socket 2"),
 2772:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2773:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2774:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2775: 
 2776:     ?P("verify 2 (default)"),
 2777:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client2, true, SPayload),
 2778: 
 2779:     ?P("cleanup 2 (default)"),
 2780:     craasp_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2781: 
 2782:     ?P("done"),
 2783:     ok.
 2784: 
 2785: 
 2786: craasp_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2787:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2788:     ?P("create listen socket *** with option switched off (default)"),
 2789:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2790:                          [{active, false}, {recbuf, 4096}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2791:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2792:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2793:     COpts = [{active, false}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++
 2794:         if
 2795:             (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2796:             is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2797:         end,
 2798:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | COpts]) of
 2799:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2800:                      CSock;
 2801:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2802:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2803:         end,
 2804:     ?P("accept connection"),
 2805:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2806:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2807:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2808:     {Client, Server}.
 2809: 
 2810: craasp_mk_payload() ->
 2811:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2812: 
 2813: craasp_populate(OS, _ISB,
 2814: 		_EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2815:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2816:     ?P("[port,server] set linger: true:0"),
 2817:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2818:     ?P("[port,server] send some data to client"),
 2819:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2820:     ?P("[port,client] send some data to server"),
 2821:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2822:     ?P("[port,client] verify (port) queue-size"),
 2823:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2824: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2825: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2826: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2827:     end,
 2828:     {ok, undefined};
 2829: craasp_populate(OS, ISB,
 2830: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2831:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2832:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2833:                       end,
 2834:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2835:                                 craasp_populate_sender(
 2836: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2837: 				     true                       -> 1
 2838: 				  end,
 2839: 				  Client,
 2840: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2841: 				  CPayload)
 2842:                         end),
 2843:     receive
 2844: 	{'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2845: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2846: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2847: 	    {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2848:     after 2000 ->
 2849:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2850:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2851:             {ok, Sender}
 2852:     end.
 2853:     
 2854: craasp_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2855:     ?P("[socket,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]), 
 2856:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2857: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2858: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] payload send failure (as expected)", [N]), 
 2859: 	    exit(normal);
 2860: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2861: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected failure reason:"
 2862: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2863: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload);
 2864: 	ok ->
 2865: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected success - expected failure with ~p",
 2866:                [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2867: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload)
 2868:     end;
 2869: craasp_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2870:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2871: 
 2872: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2873: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2874:   when is_port(Client) andalso
 2875:        ((EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset)) ->
 2876:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2877:        "~n   Port Info:     ~p"
 2878:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2879:        [EConnReset,
 2880:         try erlang:port_info(Client)
 2881:         catch
 2882:             _:_:_ ->
 2883:                 "-"
 2884:         end,
 2885:         try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2886:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2887:             _             -> "-"
 2888:         catch
 2889:             _:_:_ ->
 2890:                 "-"
 2891:         end]),
 2892:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2893:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2894:             ok;
 2895:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2896:             ok;
 2897:         {error, Reason} ->
 2898:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2899:         ok ->
 2900:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2901:     end;
 2902: craasp_verify(win32 = _OS, true = _ISB,
 2903: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2904:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2905:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2906:        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 2907:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2908:        [EConnReset, inet:info(Client),
 2909: 	try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2910:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2911:             _             -> "-"
 2912:         catch
 2913:             _:_:_ ->
 2914:                 "-"
 2915:         end]),
 2916:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2917:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2918:             ok;
 2919:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2920:             ok;
 2921:         {error, Reason} ->
 2922:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2923:         ok ->
 2924:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2925:     end;
 2926: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2927: 	      Client, EConnReset, Payload) 
 2928:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2929:     ?P("[client] attempt first recv and expect success"),
 2930:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2931:         {ok, Payload} ->
 2932:             ?P("[client] attempt second recv and expect failure (~w)",
 2933:                [EConnReset]),
 2934:             case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2935: 		{error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2936:                     ?P("[client] expected failure (closed)"),
 2937: 		    ok;
 2938: 		{error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2939:                     ?P("[client] expected failure (econnreset)"),
 2940: 		    ok;
 2941:                 {error, Reason2} ->
 2942:                     ?P("[client] unexpected failure:"
 2943:                        "~n      EConnReset: ~p"
 2944:                        "~n      Reason:     ~p", [EConnReset, Reason2]),
 2945:                     {error, {unexpected_error2, EConnReset, Reason2}};
 2946:                 {ok, _} ->
 2947:                     ?P("[client] unexpected success"),
 2948:                     {error, unexpected_recv2}
 2949:             end;                    
 2950:         {ok, _} ->
 2951:             ?P("[client] unexpected first recv success (wrong payload)"),
 2952:             {error, unexpected_recv1};
 2953:         {error, Reason1} ->
 2954:             ?P("[client] unexpected first recv failure: "
 2955:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2956:             {error, {unexpected_error1, Reason1}}
 2957:     end.
 2958: 
 2959: craasp_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2960:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2961:     craasp_cleanup(Sender).
 2962: 
 2963: craasp_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2964:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2965:     receive
 2966:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2967:             ok
 2968:     after 0 ->
 2969:             ok
 2970:     end;
 2971: craasp_cleanup(_) ->
 2972:     ok.
