 4153:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4154:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4155:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4156:                                                {packet,0},
 4157:                                                {active,false},
 4158:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4159:                                                {priority,4},
 4160:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4161:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4162:                     S2;
 4163:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4164:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4165:             end,
 4166:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4167:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4168:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4169:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos]),
 4170:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4171:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2,[priority,tos]),
 4172:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4173:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos]),
 4174:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close listen socket"),
 4175:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4176:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close connected socket"),
 4177:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4178:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> close accepted socket"),
 4179:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4180:     ?P("test_prio_accept2 -> done"),
 4181:     ok.
 4182: 
 4183: test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr) ->
 4184:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4185:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4186:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> create listen socket"),
 4187:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary,{ip, Addr},{packet,0},{active,false},
 4188:                                     {reuseaddr,true},
 4189:                                     {tos,Tos1}]),
 4190:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4191:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4192:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4193:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4194:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4195:                                                {packet,0},
 4196:                                                {active,false},
 4197:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4198:                                                {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4199:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4200:                     S2;
 4201:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4202:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4203:     end,
 4204:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> connected => accept connection"),
 4205:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4206:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> "
 4207:        "accepted => getopts prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4208:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority,tos]),
 4209:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4210:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4211:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> getopts prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4212:     {ok, [{priority,0},{tos,Tos1}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority,tos]),
 4213:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close listen socket"),
 4214:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4215:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close connected socket"),
 4216:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4217:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> close accepted socket"),
 4218:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4219:     ?P("test_prio_accept3 -> done"),
 4220:     ok.
 4221:     
 4222: test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr) ->
 4223:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4224:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4225:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4226:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> create prio server"),
 4227:     spawn(?MODULE, priority_server, [Config, Addr, {self(),Ref}]),
 4228:     Port = receive
 4229:                {Ref,P} -> P
 4230:            after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4231:            end,
 4232:     receive
 4233:     after 3000 -> ok
 4234:     end,
 4235:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4236:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4237: 					      {ip, Addr},
 4238: 					      {packet,0},
 4239:                                               {active,false},
 4240:                                               {reuseaddr,true},
 4241:                                               {priority,4},
 4242:                                               {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4243:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4244:                     S2;
 4245:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4246:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4247:             end,
 4248:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> "
 4249:        "connected => await prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4250:     receive
 4251:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4252:             ok;
 4253:         {Ref,Error} ->
 4254:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error})
 4255:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4256:     end,
 4257:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> await prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4258:     receive
 4259:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4260:             ok;
 4261:         {Ref,Error2} ->
 4262:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error2})
 4263:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4264:     end,
 4265: 
 4266:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4267:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4268:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> close connected socket"),
 4269:     catch gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4270:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> done"),
 4271:     ok.
 4272: 
 4273: priority_server(Config, Addr, {Parent,Ref}) ->
 4274:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4275:     {ok,Sock}=?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4276:                                 {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4277:                                 {tos,Tos1}]),
 4278:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4279:     Parent ! {Ref,Port},
 4280:     {ok,Sock3}=gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4281:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos])},
 4282:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos])},
 4283:     ok.
 4284: 
 4285: test_prio_fail(Config, Addr) ->
 4286:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> create listen socket"),
 4287:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4288:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> try set (and fail) opts prio (= 1000)"),
 4289:     {error,_} = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1000}]),
 4290:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close listen socket"),
 4291:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 4292:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4293:     ok.
 4294: 
 4295: test_prio_udp(Addr) ->
 4296:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4297:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> create UDP socket (open)"),
 4298:     {ok,S} = gen_udp:open(0,[{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{tos, Tos},
 4299:                              {priority,3}]),
 4300:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> getopts prio and tos"),
 4301:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(S,[priority,tos]),
 4302:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close socket"),
 4303:     gen_udp:close(S),
 4304:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4305:     ok.
 4306: 
 4307: %% Tests the so_priority and ip_tos options on sockets when applicable.
 4308: so_priority(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4309:     Cond = fun() ->
 4310: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 4311: 		       true ->
 4312: 		           is_socket_supported(),
 4313:                            has_support_sock_priority();
 4314: 		       false ->
 4315: 			   ok
 4316: 		   end
 4317:     	 end,
 4318:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4319:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4320:                             Addr;
 4321:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4322:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4323:                     end
 4324:            end,
 4325:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_so_priority(Config, Addr) end,
 4326:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4327:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4328: 
 4329: do_so_priority(Config, Addr) ->
 4330:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 4331:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4332:     ?P("set opts on listen socket: prio to 1"),
 4333:     ok = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1}]),
 4334:     ?P("verify prio"),
 4335:     case inet:getopts(L,[priority]) of
 4336: 	{ok,[{priority,1}]} ->
 4337:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 4338: 	    gen_tcp:close(L),
 4339: 	    test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr),
 4340: 	    test_prio_accept(Config, Addr),
 4341: 	    test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr),
 4342: 	    test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr),
 4343: 	    test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr),
 4344: 	    test_prio_fail(Config, Addr),
 4345: 	    test_prio_udp(Addr),
 4346:             ?P("done"),
 4347: 	    ok;
 4348: 	_X ->
 4349: 	    case os:type() of
 4350: 		{unix,linux} ->
 4351: 		    case os:version() of
 4352: 			{X,Y,_} when (X > 2) or ((X =:= 2) and (Y >= 4)) ->
 4353:                             ?P("so prio should work on this version: "
 4354:                                "~n      ~p", [_X]),
 4355: 			    ct:fail({error,
 4356: 					   "so_priority should work on this "
 4357: 					   "OS, but does not"});
 4358: 			_ ->
 4359: 			    {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4360: 		    end;
 4361: 		_ ->
 4362: 		   {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4363: 	    end
 4364:     end.
 4365: 
 4366: 
 4367: 
 4368: %% IP_RECVTOS and IP_RECVTCLASS for IP_PKTOPTIONS
 4369: %% does not seem to be implemented in Linux until kernel 3.1
 4370: %%
 4371: %% It seems pktoptions does not return valid values
 4372: %% for IPv4 connect sockets.  On the accept socket
 4373: %% we get valid values, but on the connect socket we get
 4374: %% the default values for TOS and TTL.
 4375: %%
 4376: %% Therefore the argument CheckConnect that enables
 4377: %% checking the returned values for the connect socket.
 4378: %% It is only used for recvtclass that is an IPv6 option
 4379: %% and there we get valid values from both socket ends.
 4380: 
 4381: has_support_ip_pktoptions() ->
 4382:     has_support_ip_option(pktoptions).
 4383: 
 4384: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
 4385:     has_support_ip_option(recvtos).
 4386: 
 4387: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
 4388:     has_support_ip_option(recvttl).
 4389: 
 4390: has_support_ipv6_pktoptions() ->
 4391:     has_support_ipv6_option(pktoptions).
 4392: 
 4393: has_support_ipv6_tclass() ->
 4394:     has_support_ipv6_option(tclass).
 4395: 
 4396: has_support_ip_option(Opt) ->
 4397:     has_support_option(ip, Opt).
 4398: 
 4399: has_support_ipv6_option(Opt) ->
 4400:     has_support_option(ipv6, Opt).
 4401: 
 4402: has_support_option(Level, Option) ->
 4403:     try socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option)
 4404:     catch
 4405: 	_:_:_ -> false % Any platform that does not support socket!
 4406:     end.
 4407: 
 4408: has_os_support_recvtos() ->
 4409:     has_os_support_recvtos(os:type(), os:version()).
 4410: 
 4411: has_os_support_recvtos({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4412:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4413: has_os_support_recvtos(_, _) ->
 4414:     true.
 4415: 
 4416: has_os_support_recvttl() ->
 4417:     has_os_support_recvttl(os:type(), os:version()).
 4418: 
 4419: has_os_support_recvttl({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4420:     not semver_lt(Version, {2,7,0});
 4421: has_os_support_recvttl(_, _) ->
 4422:     %% We should not even get here, but just in case...
 4423:     false.
 4424: 
 4425: has_os_support_recvtclass() ->
 4426:     has_os_support_recvtclass(os:type(), os:version()).
 4427: 
 4428: has_os_support_recvtclass({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4429:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4430: has_os_support_recvtclass(_, _) ->
 4431:     true.
 4432: 
 4433: semver_lt({X1,Y1,Z1} = V1, {X2,Y2,Z2} = V2) ->
 4434:     ?P("semver_lt -> OS version check:"
 4435:        "~n   (Actual)  Version 1: ~p"
 4436:        "~n   (Request) Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4437:     if
 4438:         X1 > X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 > X2: ~p > ~p", [X1, X2]), false;
 4439:         X1 < X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 < X2: ~p < ~p", [X1, X2]), true;
 4440:         Y1 > Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 > Y2: ~p > ~p", [Y1, Y2]), false;
 4441:         Y1 < Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 < Y2: ~p < ~p", [Y1, Y2]), true;
 4442:         Z1 > Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 > Z2: ~p > ~p", [Z1, Z2]), false;
 4443:         Z1 < Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 < Z2: ~p < ~p", [Z1, Z2]), true;
 4444:         true    -> ?P("semver_lt -> default"), false
 4445:     end;
 4446: semver_lt(V1, {_,_,_} = V2) ->
 4447:     ?P("semver_lt -> fallback OS version check when: "
 4448:        "~n   Version 1: ~p"
 4449:        "~n   Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4450:     false.
 4451: 
 4452: recvtos(Config) ->
 4453:     test_pktoptions(
 4454:       Config,
 4455:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96}],
 4456:       fun() ->
 4457:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4458:                   has_os_support_recvtos() 
 4459:      end,
 4460:       "recvtos",
 4461:       false).
 4462: 
 4463: recvtosttl(Config) ->
 4464:     test_pktoptions(
 4465:       Config,
 4466:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96},{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4467:       fun() ->
 4468:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4469: 		  has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4470:                   has_os_support_recvtos() andalso
 4471:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4472:       end,
 4473:       "recvtos and/or recvttl",
 4474:       false).
 4475: 
 4476: recvttl(Config) ->
 4477:     test_pktoptions(
 4478:       Config,
 4479:       inet, [{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4480:       fun() ->
 4481:               has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4482:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4483:       end,
 4484:       "recvttl",
 4485:       false).
 4486: 
 4487: recvtclass(Config) ->
 4488:     {ok,IFs} = inet:getifaddrs(),
 4489:     case
 4490:         [Name ||
 4491:             {Name,Opts} <- IFs,
 4492:             lists:member({addr,{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}, Opts)]
 4493:     of
 4494:         [_] ->
 4495:             test_pktoptions(
 4496:               Config,
 4497:               inet6, [{recvtclass,tclass,224}],
 4498:               fun() ->
 4499:                       has_support_ipv6_tclass() andalso
 4500:                           has_os_support_recvtclass()
 4501:               end,
 4502:               "tclass",
 4503:               true);
 4504:         [] ->
 4505:             {skip,{ipv6_not_supported,IFs}}
 4506:     end.
 4507: 
 4508: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, OptCond, OptStr, CheckConnect) ->
 4509:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4510:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4511:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4512:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4513:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4514:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4515:     PktOptsCond = fun(inet)  -> has_support_ip_pktoptions();
 4516: 		     (inet6) -> has_support_ipv6_pktoptions()
 4517: 		  end,
 4518:     try PktOptsCond(Family) of
 4519: 	true ->
 4520: 	    ?P("pktoptions supported for family ~w", [Family]),
 4521: 	    case OptCond() of
 4522: 		true ->
 4523: 		    ?P("options supported: "
 4524: 		       "~n   ~p", [Spec]),
 4525: 		    test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect);
 4526: 		false ->
 4527: 		    {skip, ?F("Option(s) ~s not supported", [OptStr])}
 4528: 	    end;
 4529:         false ->
 4530:             {skip,
 4531:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4532:     catch
 4533:         _:_:_ ->
 4534:             {skip,
 4535:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4536:     end.
 4537: %%
 4538: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect) ->
 4539:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4540:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4541:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4542:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4543:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4544:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4545:     Timeout = 5000,
 4546:     RecvOpts = [RecvOpt || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4547:     TrueRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,true} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4548:     FalseRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,false} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4549:     Opts = [Opt || {_,Opt,_} <- Spec],
 4550:     OptsVals = [{Opt,Val} || {_,Opt,Val} <- Spec],
 4551:     Address =
 4552:         case Family of
 4553:             inet ->
 4554:                 {127,0,0,1};
 4555:             inet6 ->
 4556:                 {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
 4557:         end,
 4558:     %%
 4559:     %% Set RecvOpts on listen socket
 4560:     ?P("try create listen socket with: ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4561:     {ok, L} =
 4562:         ?LISTEN(Config, 
 4563:                 0,
 4564:                 [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4565:                  |TrueRecvOpts]),
 4566:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 4567:     ?P("get (recv) options for listen socket: "
 4568:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4569:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4570:     ?P("get options for listen socket: "
 4571:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4572:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4573: 
 4574:     %%
 4575:     %% Set RecvOpts and Option values on connect socket
 4576:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4577:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals]),
 4578:     {ok, S2} =
 4579:         ?CONNECT(Config,
 4580:                  Address, P,
 4581:                  [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4582:                   |TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals],
 4583:                  Timeout),
 4584:     ?P("get (recv) options for connect socket: "
 4585:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4586:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S2, RecvOpts),
 4587:     ?P("get options for connect socket: "
 4588:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4589:     {ok, OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S2, Opts),
 4590: 
 4591:     %%
 4592:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4593:     ?P("try create accept socket"),
 4594:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4595:     ?P("get (recv) options for accept socket: "
 4596:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4597:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S1, RecvOpts),
 4598: 
 4599:     ?P("get options for accept socket: "
 4600:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4601:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S1, Opts),
 4602:     ?P("accept socket option values: "
 4603:        "~n   ~p", [OptsValsDefault]),
 4604: 
 4605: %%%    %%
 4606: %%%    %% Handshake
 4607: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S1, <<"hello">>),
 4608: %%%    {ok,<<"hello">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S2, 5, Timeout),
 4609: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S2, <<"hi">>),
 4610: %%%    {ok,<<"hi">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 2, Timeout),
 4611: 
 4612:     %%
 4613:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4614:     VerifyRemOpts =
 4615:         fun(S, Role) ->
 4616:                 case inet:getopts(S, [pktoptions]) of
 4617:                     {ok, []} ->
 4618:                         ?SKIPT("pktoptions not supported");
 4619:                     {ok, [{pktoptions, PktOpts1}]} ->
 4620:                         ?P("PktOptions (~w): "
 4621:                            "~n      ~p", [Role, PktOpts1]),
 4622:                         PktOpts1;
 4623:                     {ok, UnexpOK1} ->
 4624:                         ?P("Unexpected OK (~w): "
 4625:                            "~n   ~p"
 4626:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpOK1]),
 4627:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_ok,
 4628:                               Role,
 4629:                               Spec,
 4630:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4631:                               OptsVals,
 4632:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4633:                               UnexpOK1});
 4634:                     {error, UnexpERR1} ->
 4635:                         ?P("Unexpected ERROR (~w): "
 4636:                            "~n   ~p"
 4637:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpERR1]),
 4638:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_failure,
 4639:                               Role,
 4640:                               Spec,
 4641:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4642:                               OptsVals,
 4643:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4644:                               UnexpERR1})
 4645:                 end
 4646:         end,
 4647:     ?P("verify dest (accept)"),
 4648:     OptsVals1 = VerifyRemOpts(S1, dest),
 4649:     ?P("verify orig (connect)"),
 4650:     OptsVals2 = VerifyRemOpts(S2, orig),
 4651:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals1}]} = inet:getopts(S1, [pktoptions]),
 4652:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals2}]} = inet:getopts(S2, [pktoptions]),
 4653:     (Result1 = sets_eq(OptsVals1, OptsVals))
 4654:         orelse ?P("Accept differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals1,OptsVals]),
 4655:     (Result2 = sets_eq(OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault))
 4656:         orelse ?P("Connect differs: ~p neq ~p",
 4657:                   [OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault]),
 4658:     %%
 4659:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4660:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
 4661:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4662:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 4663:     %%
 4664:     %%
 4665:     %% Clear RecvOpts on listen socket and set Option values
 4666:     ?P("clear (recv) options on listen socket"),
 4667:     ok = inet:setopts(L, FalseRecvOpts ++ OptsVals),
 4668:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4669:     ?P("set  options on listen socket"),
 4670:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4671: 
 4672:     %%
 4673:     %% Set RecvOpts on connecting socket
 4674:     %%
 4675:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4676:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4677:     {ok,S4} =
 4678:         ?CONNECT(Config, 
 4679:           Address, P,
 4680:           [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4681:           |TrueRecvOpts],
 4682:           Timeout),
 4683:     ?P("get (recv) options on connect socket"),
 4684:     {ok,TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S4, RecvOpts),
 4685:     ?P("get options on connect socket"),
 4686:     {ok,OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S4, Opts),
 4687: 
 4688:     %%
 4689:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4690:     ?P("create accept socket"),
 4691:     {ok,S3} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4692:     ?P("get (recv) options on accept socket"),
 4693:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S3, RecvOpts),
 4694:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S3, Opts),
 4695:     %%
 4696:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4697:     ?P("verify pktoptions on accept socket"),
 4698:     {ok,[{pktoptions,[]}]} = inet:getopts(S3, [pktoptions]),
 4699:     ?P("verify pktoptions on connect socket"),
 4700:     {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals4}]} = inet:getopts(S4, [pktoptions]),
 4701:     ?P("verify options set"),
 4702:     (Result3 = sets_eq(OptsVals4, OptsVals))
 4703:         orelse ?P("Accept2 differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals4, OptsVals]),
 4704:     %%
 4705:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4706:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S4),
 4707:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4708:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
 4709:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 4710:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 4711:     ?P("verify final result"
 4712:        "~n   Result1:       ~p"
 4713:        "~n   Check Connect: ~p"
 4714:        "~n   Result2:       ~p"
 4715:        "~n   Result3:       ~p",
 4716:       [Result1, CheckConnect, Result2, Result3]),
 4717:     (Result1 and ((not CheckConnect) or (Result2 and Result3)))
 4718:         orelse
 4719:         exit({failed,
 4720:               [{OptsVals1,OptsVals4,OptsVals},
 4721:                {OptsVals2,OptsValsDefault}]}),
 4722:     ?P("done"),
 4723:     ok.
 4724: 
 4725: sets_eq(L1, L2) ->
 4726:     lists:sort(L1) == lists:sort(L2).
 4727: 
 4728: 
 4729: 
 4730: %% Accept test utilities (suites are below)
 4731: 
 4732: millis() ->
 4733:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 4734: 	
 4735: collect_accepts(0, _) -> [];
 4736: collect_accepts(N, Tmo) ->
 4737:     A = millis(),
 4738:     receive
 4739: 	{accepted, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4740:             ?P("~p Failed accept: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4741:             ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 4742: 
 4743:         {accepted, P, Msg} ->
 4744:             ?P("received 'accepted' from ~p: "
 4745:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4746:             NextN = if N =:= infinity -> N; true -> N - 1 end,
 4747: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_accepts(NextN, Tmo - (millis()-A))
 4748: 
 4749:     after Tmo ->
 4750:             ?P("accept timeout (~w)", [Tmo]),
 4751: 	    []
 4752:     end.
 4753: 
 4754: -define(EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern,N,Timeout),
 4755: 	(fun() ->
 4756:                  case collect_accepts((N), (Timeout)) of
 4757: 		     Pattern ->
 4758: 			 ok;
 4759: 		     Other__ ->
 4760: 			 {error, {unexpected, {Other__, messages()}}}
 4761: 		 end
 4762: 	 end)()).
 4763: 	
 4764: collect_connects(Tmo) ->
 4765:     A = millis(),
 4766:     receive
 4767: 	{connected, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4768:             ?P("~p Failed connect: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4769:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 4770: 
 4771: 	{connected,P,Msg} ->
 4772:             ?P("received connected from ~p: "
 4773:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4774: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_connects(Tmo-(millis() - A))
 4775: 
 4776:     after Tmo ->
 4777: 	    []
 4778:     end.
 4779:    
 4780: -define(EXPECT_CONNECTS(Pattern,Timeout),
 4781: 	(fun() ->
 4782: 		 case collect_connects(Timeout) of
 4783: 		     Pattern ->
 4784: 			 ok;
 4785: 		     Other ->
 4786: 			 {error,{unexpected,Other}}
 4787: 		 end
 4788: 	 end)()).
 4789: 
 4790: mktmofun(Tmo,Parent,LS) ->
 4791:     fun() ->
 4792:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> try accept"),
 4793:             AcceptResult = catch gen_tcp:accept(LS, Tmo),            
 4794:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> accepted: "
 4795:                "~n   ~p", [AcceptResult]),
 4796:             Parent ! {accepted,self(), AcceptResult}
 4797:     end.
 4798: 
 4799: %% Accept tests
 4800: %% Test singular accept.
 4801: primitive_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4802:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4803:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4804:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4805:                             Addr;
 4806:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4807:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4808:                     end
 4809:            end,
 4810:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) end,
 4811:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4812:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4813: 
 4814: do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4815:     LSock =
 4816:         case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4817:             {ok, LS} ->
 4818:                 LS;
 4819:             {error, LReason} ->
 4820:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 4821:         end,
 4822:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LSock),
 4823:     Parent = self(),
 4824:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LSock)} end,
 4825:     P = spawn(F),
 4826:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4827:         {ok, _} ->
 4828:             ok;
 4829:         {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 4830:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 4831:     end,        
 4832:     receive
 4833:         {accepted,P,{ok,P0}} when is_port(P0) ->
 4834:             ok;
 4835:         {accepted,P,Other0} ->
 4836:             {error,Other0}
 4837:     after 500 ->
 4838:               {error,timeout}
 4839:     end.
 4840: 
 4841: 	
 4842: %% Closing listen socket when multi-accepting.
 4843: multi_accept_close_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4844:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4845:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4846:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4847:                             Addr;
 4848:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4849:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4850:                     end
 4851:            end,
 4852:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) end,
 4853:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4854:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4855: 
 4856: do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) ->
 4857:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 4858:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4859:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4860:                  LSocket;
 4861:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4862:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 4863:          end,
 4864:     Parent = self(),
 4865:     F = fun() ->
 4866:                 ?P("started"),
 4867:                 Accepted = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 4868:                 ?P("accept result: ~p", [Accepted]),
 4869:                 Parent ! {accepted,self(),Accepted}
 4870:         end,
 4871:     ?P("create acceptor processes"),
 4872:     spawn(F),
 4873:     spawn(F),
 4874:     spawn(F),
 4875:     spawn(F),
 4876:     ?P("sleep some"),
 4877:     ct:sleep(?SECS(2)),
 4878:     ?P("close (listen) socket"),
 4879:     gen_tcp:close(LS),
 4880:     ?P("await accepts"),
 4881:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}},
 4882:                           {_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}}],4,500),
 4883:     ?P("done"),
 4884:     ok.

 4912: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order.
 4913: accept_timeouts_in_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 5059: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order after
 5060: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more).
 5061: accept_timeouts_in_order6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5062:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5063:     Pre  = fun() ->
 5064: 		   ?P("try get local address"),
 5065: 		   {ok, Addr} = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 5066: 		   ?P("try create listen socket"), 
 5067: 		   case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5068: 		       {ok, LSocket} ->
 5069: 			   #{socket => LSocket};
 5070: 		       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5071: 			   ?P("failed creating socket: ~p", [Reason]),
 5072: 			   {skip, listen_failed_str(Reason)}
 5073: 		   end
 5074: 	   end,
 5075:     TC   = fun(I) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(I) end,
 5076:     Post = fun(#{socket := LSock}) ->
 5077: 		   gen_tcp:close(LSock)
 5078: 	   end,
 5079:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5080: 
 5081: do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(#{socket := LS}) ->    
 5082:     Parent = self(),
 5083: 
 5084:     ?P("create acceptor 1 with timeout 1000"),
 5085:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5086: 
 5087:     ?P("create acceptor 2 with timeout 400"),
 5088:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5089: 
 5090:     ?P("create acceptor 3 with timeout 600"),
 5091:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),
 5092: 
 5093:     ?P("create acceptor 4 with timeout 200"),
 5094:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(200,Parent,LS)),
 5095: 
 5096:     ?P("await accept timeouts from (in order): "
 5097:        "~n   Acceptor 4: ~p"
 5098:        "~n   Acceptor 2: ~p"
 5099:        "~n   Acceptor 3: ~p"
 5100:        "~n   Acceptor 1: ~p", [P4, P2, P3, P1]),
 5101:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{error,timeout}},
 5102:                           {P2,{error,timeout}},
 5103: 			  {P3,{error,timeout}},
 5104:                           {P1,{error,timeout}}],
 5105:                          infinity, 2000).

 5108: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more++).

 5111:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of

 5134:     P5 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5135:     P6 = spawn(mktmofun(800,Parent,LS)),

 5137:     P8 = spawn(mktmofun(1400,Parent,LS)),
 5138:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{error,timeout}},{P5,{error,timeout}},
 5139: 			  {P4,{error,timeout}},{P6,{error,timeout}},
 5140: 			  {P1,{error,timeout}},{P3,{error,timeout}},
 5141: 			  {P8,{error,timeout}},{P7,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000).
 5142: 
 5143: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts behave correctly when
 5144: %% mixed with successful timeouts.
 5145: %% Note that on Windows with inet_backend = socket we 
 5146: %% have *no* control over the accept order!
 5147: accept_timeouts_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5148:     Cond = fun() ->
 5149: 		   is_windows() andalso
 5150: 		       ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 5151: 		       ?SKIPT("Not compat with 'socket of Windows'"),
 5152: 		   ok
 5153: 	   end,
 5154:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5155:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5156:                             Addr;
 5157:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5158:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5159:                     end
 5160:            end,
 5161:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) end,
 5162:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5163:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5164: 
 5165: do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) ->
 5166:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5167:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5168:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5169:                  LSocket;
 5170:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5171:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5172:          end,
 5173:     Parent = self(),
 5174:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5175: 
 5176:     ?P("listen socket"
 5177:        "~n   ~p"
 5178:        "~n   Port: ~p", [LS, PortNo]),
 5179: 
 5180:     ?P("create acceptor process 1 (with timeout 1000)"),
 5181:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5182: 
 5183:     ?P("await 1 (~p) accepting", [P1]),
 5184:     wait_until_accepting(P1,500),
 5185: 
 5186:     ?P("create acceptor process 2 (with timeout 2000)"),
 5187:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(2000,Parent,LS)),
 5188: 
 5189:     ?P("await 2 (~p) accepting", [P2]),
 5190:     wait_until_accepting(P2,500),
 5191: 
 5192:     ?P("create acceptor process 3 (with timeout 3000)"),
 5193:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(3000,Parent,LS)),
 5194: 
 5195:     ?P("await 3 (~p) accepting", [P3]),
 5196:     wait_until_accepting(P3,500),
 5197: 
 5198:     ?P("create acceptor process 4 (with timeout 4000)"),
 5199:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(4000,Parent,LS)),
 5200: 
 5201:     ?P("await 4 (~p) accepting", [P4]),
 5202:     wait_until_accepting(P4,500),
 5203: 
 5204:     ?P("expect accept from 1 (~p) with timeout", [P1]),
 5205:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}}],infinity,1500),
 5206: 
 5207:     ?P("connect"),
 5208:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5209:         {ok, _} ->
 5210:             ok;
 5211:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 5212:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 5213:     end,
 5214: 
 5215:     ?P("expect accept from 2 (~p) with success", [P2]),
 5216:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5217:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,Port0}}] when is_port(Port0),
 5218:                                                         infinity,100);
 5219:        true ->
 5220:             case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,_}}],infinity,100) of
 5221: 		ok ->
 5222: 		    ok;
 5223: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 5224: 		    ?P("Failed accept: "
 5225: 		       "~n   P2:     ~p"
 5226: 		       "~n   Reason: ~p", [P2, Reason2]),
 5227: 		    ct:fail(unexpected_accepts)
 5228: 	    end
 5229:     end,
 5230: 
 5231:     ?P("expect accept from 3 (~p) with timeout", [P3]),
 5232:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P3,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000),
 5233: 
 5234:     ?P("connect"),
 5235:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5236:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 5237:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason3));
 5238:         _  ->
 5239:             ok
 5240:     end,
 5241: 
 5242:     ?P("expect accept from 4 (~p) with success", [P4]),
 5243:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5244:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,Port1}}] when is_port(Port1),
 5245:                                                         infinity,100);
 5246:        true ->
 5247:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,_Port1}}],infinity,100)
 5248:     end,
 5249: 
 5250:     ?P("done"),
 5251:     ok.
 5252: 
 5253: %% Check that single acceptor behaves as expected when killed.
 5254: killing_acceptor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5255:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5256:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5257:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5258:                             Addr;
 5259:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5260:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5261:                     end
 5262:            end,
 5263:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) end,
 5264:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5265:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5266: 
 5267: do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) ->
 5268:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5269:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5270:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5271:             do_killing_acceptor_inet(LSocket);
 5272:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5273:             do_killing_acceptor_socket(LSocket);
 5274:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5275:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5276:     end,
 5277:     ?P("done"),
 5278:     ok.
 5279: 
 5280: do_killing_acceptor_inet(LS) ->
 5281:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5282:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5283: 
 5284:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5285:     Pid = spawn(
 5286:             fun() ->
 5287:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5288:             end),
 5289:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5290:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5291:     end,
 5292: 
 5293:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5294:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5295: 
 5296:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5297:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5298:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5299:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5300:     end,
 5301: 
 5302:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5303:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5304: 
 5305:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5306:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5307:     ok.
 5308: 
 5309: do_killing_acceptor_socket(LS) ->
 5310:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5311:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5312: 
 5313:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5314:     Pid = spawn(
 5315:             fun() ->
 5316:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5317:             end),
 5318:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5319:     ct:sleep(100),
 5320: 
 5321:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5322:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5323: 
 5324:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5325:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5326:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5327:     ct:sleep(1000),
 5328: 
 5329:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5330:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5331: 
 5332:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5333:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5334:     ok.
 5335:     
 5336: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpStates, ExpNotStates) when is_port(LS) ->
 5337:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5338:         #{states := States} ->
 5339: 
 5340:             ?P("try validate (listen socket) state when: "
 5341:                "~n   Exp States:     ~p"
 5342:                "~n   Exp Not States: ~p"
 5343:                "~n   States:         ~p", [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5344: 
 5345:             %% State *shall* contain ExpStates => States1 =/= States
 5346:             States1 = States -- ExpStates,
 5347: 
 5348:             %% State shall *not* contain ExpNotStates => States2 =:= States
 5349:             States2 = States -- ExpNotStates,
 5350: 
 5351:             if
 5352:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5353:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5354:                     ?P("validated: "
 5355:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5356:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5357:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates]),
 5358:                     ok;
 5359:                true ->
 5360:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5361:                        "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5362:                        "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5363:                        "~n   States:              ~p",
 5364:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5365:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5366:             end;
 5367: 
 5368:         InvalidInfo ->
 5369:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5370:                "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5371:                "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5372:                "~n   Invalid Info:        ~p",
 5373:                [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, InvalidInfo]),
 5374:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5375:     end.
 5376: 
 5377: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, ExpNotState) ->
 5378:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5379:         #{num_acceptors := ExpNumAcc, rstates := States} ->
 5380:             ?P("try validate state when: "
 5381:                "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5382:                "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5383:                "~n   RStates:            ~p", [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5384: 
 5385:             %% States *shall* contain ExpState => States1 =/= States
 5386:             States1 = States -- ExpState,
 5387:             
 5388:             %% States shall *not* contain ExpNotState => States2 =:= States
 5389:             States2 = States -- ExpNotState,
 5390: 
 5391:             if
 5392:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5393:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5394:                     ?P("validated: "
 5395:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5396:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5397:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState]),
 5398:                     ok;
 5399:                true ->
 5400:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5401:                        "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5402:                        "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5403:                        "~n   States:             ~p",
 5404:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5405:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5406:             end;
 5407: 
 5408:         #{num_acceptors := NumAcc, rstates := RStates, wstates := WStates} ->
 5409:             ?P("invalid state: "
 5410:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5411:                "~n   Num Acceptors:          ~w"
 5412:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5413:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5414:                "~n   RStates:                ~p"
 5415:                "~n   WStates:                ~p",
 5416:                [ExpNumAcc, NumAcc, ExpState, RStates, WStates]),
 5417:             ct:fail("Invalid state");
 5418: 
 5419:         InvalidInfo ->
 5420:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5421:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5422:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5423:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5424:                "~n   Invalid Info:           ~p",
 5425:                [ExpNumAcc, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, InvalidInfo]),
 5426:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5427:     end.
 5428:     
 5429: 
 5430: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed.
 5431: killing_multi_acceptors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5432:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5433:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5434:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5435:                             Addr;
 5436:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5437:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5438:                     end
 5439:            end,
 5440:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) end,
 5441:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5442:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5443: 
 5444: do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) ->
 5445:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5446:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5447:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5448:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LSocket);
 5449:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5450:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LSocket);
 5451:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5452:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5453:     end,
 5454:     ?P("done"),
 5455:     ok.
 5456: 
 5457: do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LS) ->
 5458:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5459:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5460: 
 5461:     Parent = self(),
 5462:     F1  = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5463:     Tmo = 1000,
 5464:     F2  = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5465:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5466:     Pid1 = spawn(F1),
 5467:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5468:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5469: 
 5470:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5471:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5472: 
 5473:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5474:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5475: 
 5476:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5477:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 5478: 
 5479:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5480:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5481: 
 5482:     ?P("validate state - still accepting"),
 5483:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5484: 
 5485:     ?P("await second acceptor exit (timeout)"),
 5486:     %% In order to avoid race condition, double the time
 5487:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2, {error,timeout}}], 1, 2 * Tmo) of
 5488: 	ok ->
 5489: 	    ?P("second acceptor - expected result"),
 5490: 	    ok;
 5491: 	Any ->
 5492: 	    ?P("second acceptor - failed:"
 5493: 	       "~n      ~p", [Any]),
 5494: 	    %% Check what Pid2 is doing
 5495: 	    Pid2Info1 = process_info(Pid2),
 5496: 	    Pid2Msgs1 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5497: 	    %% Check if this is just a race...
 5498: 	    ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5499: 	    Pid2Info2 = process_info(Pid2),
 5500: 	    Pid2Msgs2 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5501: 	    ?P("second acceptor failed - check ~p"
 5502: 	       "~n      Info 1: ~p"
 5503: 	       "~n      Msgs 1: ~p"
 5504: 	       "~n   After 1 sec sleep:"
 5505: 	       "~n      Info 2: ~p"
 5506: 	       "~n      Msgs 2: ~p",
 5507: 	       [Pid2, Pid2Info1, Pid2Msgs1, Pid2Info2, Pid2Msgs2]),
 5508: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_accepts, Any})
 5509:     end,
 5510: 
 5511:     ?P("validate state - *not* accepting"),
 5512:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5513: 
 5514:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5515:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5516:     ok.
 5517: 
 5518: do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LS) ->
 5519:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5520:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5521: 
 5522:     Parent = self(),
 5523:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5524:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5525:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5526:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5527:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5528:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5529: 
 5530:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5531:     ct:sleep(100),
 5532: 
 5533:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5534:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5535: 
 5536:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5537:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5538:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5539:     ct:sleep(100),
 5540: 
 5541:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5542:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5543: 
 5544:     ?P("await second acceptor exit - timeout"),
 5545:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2,{error,timeout}}],1,1000),
 5546: 
 5547:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5548:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5549: 
 5550:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5551:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5552:     ok.

 5558:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5559:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5560:                             Addr;

 5562:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5563:                     end
 5564:            end,

 5570:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5571:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5572:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->

 5575:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_socket(Config, LSocket);
 5576:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5577:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5578:     end,
 5579:     ?P("done"),
 5580:     ok.
 5581: 
 5582: do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LS) ->
 5583:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5584:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5585: 
 5586:     Parent = self(),
 5587:     ?P("get port number for listen socket"),
 5588:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5589: 
 5590:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5591:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5592: 
 5593:     ?P("create acceptor process 1"),
 5594:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5595:     ?P("create acceptor process 2"),
 5596:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 5597:     ?P("wait some"),
 5598:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5599:     end,
 5600: 
 5601:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5602:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5603: 
 5604:     ?P("kill acceptor 1"),
 5605:     exit(Pid,kill),
 5606: 
 5607:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5608:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5609:     end,
 5610: 
 5611:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5612:     {ok, L2} = prim_inet:getstatus(LS),
 5613:     true  = lists:member(accepting, L2),
 5614: 
 5615:     ?P("kill acceptor 2"),
 5616:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 5617: 
 5618:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5619:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5620:     end,
 5621: 
 5622:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5623:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5624: 
 5625:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5626:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5627: 
 5628:     ?P("wait some"),
 5629:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5630:     end,
 5631: 
 5632:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5633:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5634: 
 5635:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5636:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5637: 
 5638:     ?P("await accept"),
 5639:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok,CSock}}] when is_port(CSock),1,100),
 5640: 
 5641:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5642:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5643: 
 5644:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5645:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5646:     ok.
 5647:

 5691: 
 5692:     ?P("wait some"),

 5694:

 5711: 
 5712: %% Checks that multi-accept works when more than one accept can be
 5713: %% done at once (wb test of inet_driver).
 5714: several_accepts_in_one_go(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5715:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5716:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5717:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5718:                             Addr;
 5719:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5720:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5721:                     end
 5722:            end,
 5723:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) end,
 5724:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5725:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5726: 
 5727: do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) ->
 5728:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5729:     NumActors = 8,
 5730:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {backlog, NumActors}]) of
 5731:              {ok, LSock} ->
 5732:                  LSock;
 5733:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5734:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5735:          end,
 5736:     Parent = self(),
 5737:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5738:     F1 = fun() ->
 5739: 		 ?P("acceptor starting"),
 5740: 		 Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)}
 5741:          end,
 5742:     F2 = fun() ->
 5743: 		 ?P("connector starting"),
 5744: 		 Parent ! {connected,self(),
 5745:                            ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}])}
 5746:          end,
 5747:     Ns = lists:seq(1, NumActors),
 5748:     ?P("start acceptors"),
 5749:     _  = [spawn(F1) || _ <- Ns],
 5750:     ?P("await accept timeouts"),
 5751:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([],1,500), % wait for tmo
 5752:     ?P("start connectors"),
 5753:     _  = [spawn(F2) || _ <- Ns],
 5754:     ?P("await accepts"),
 5755:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],NumActors,15000),
 5756:     ?P("await connects"),
 5757:     ok = ?EXPECT_CONNECTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],1000),
 5758:     ?P("done"),
 5759:     ok.
 5760: 
 5761: flush(Msgs) ->
 5762:     erlang:yield(),
 5763:     receive Msg -> flush([Msg|Msgs])
 5764:     after     0 -> lists:reverse(Msgs)
 5765:     end.
 5766: 
 5767: wait_until_accepting(Proc,0) ->
 5768:     exit({timeout_waiting_for_accepting,Proc});
 5769: wait_until_accepting(Proc,N) ->
 5770:     case process_info(Proc,current_function) of
 5771:         {current_function, {prim_inet, accept0, 3}} ->
 5772:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5773:                 {status,waiting} ->
 5774: 		    ?P("[prim_inet] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5775:                     ok;
 5776:                 _O1 ->
 5777:                     receive 
 5778:                     after 5 ->
 5779:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5780:                     end
 5781:             end;
 5782:         {current_function, {gen, do_call, 4}} ->
 5783:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5784:                 {status,waiting} -> 
 5785: 		    ?P("[gen] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5786:                     ok;
 5787:                 _O1 ->
 5788:                     receive 
 5789:                     after 5 ->
 5790:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5791:                     end
 5792:             end;
 5793:         _O2 ->
 5794:             receive 
 5795:             after 5 ->
 5796:                     wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5797:             end
 5798:     end.
 5799: 
 5800: 
 5801: %% Check that accept returns {error, system_limit}
 5802: %% (and not {error, enfile}) when running out of ports.
 5803: accept_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5804:     Cond = fun() ->
 5805: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 5806: 		       true ->
 5807: 			   {skip, "Not compliant with socket"};
 5808: 		       false ->
 5809: 			   ok
 5810: 		   end
 5811: 	   end,
 5812:     TC   = fun() -> do_accept_system_limit(Config) end,
 5813:     ?TC_TRY(accept_system_limit, Cond, TC).
 5814: 
 5815: do_accept_system_limit(Config) ->
 5816:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5817:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, []) of
 5818:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5819:                  LSocket;
 5820:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5821:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5822:         end,             
 5823:     {ok, {Addr, Port}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5824:     ?P("listen socket \"bound\" to:"
 5825:        "~n      Address: ~p"
 5826:        "~n      Port:    ~p", [Addr, Port]),
 5827:     Me = self(),
 5828:     ?P("create connector"),
 5829:     Connector = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5830:                                    connector(Config, Port, Me)
 5831:                            end),
 5832:     ?P("sync with connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5833:     receive {Connector, sync} -> Connector ! {self(), continue} end,
 5834:     ?P("begin accepting"),
 5835:     ok = acceptor(Connector, LS, false, []),
 5836:     ?P("stop connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5837:     Connector ! stop,
 5838:     ?P("done"),
 5839:     ok.
 5840: 
 5841: acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, A) ->
 5842:     case gen_tcp:accept(LS, 1000) of
 5843:         {ok, S} ->
 5844:             acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, [S|A]);
 5845:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5846:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 5847:         {error, system_limit} ->
 5848:             ?P("acceptor: "
 5849:                "system limit => *almost* done (~w)", [length(A)]),
 5850:             acceptor(Connector, LS, true, A);
 5851:         {error, timeout} when GotSL ->
 5852:             ?P("acceptor: timeout (with system limit) => done (~w)",
 5853:                [length(A)]),
 5854:             ok;
 5855:         {error, timeout} ->
 5856:             ?P("acceptor: timeout *without* system limit => failure"
 5857:                "~n     Number of Accepted: ~w",
 5858:                [length(A)]),
 5859:             error
 5860:     end.
 5861: 
 5862: connector(Config, AccPort, Tester) ->
 5863:     ?P("[connector] start"),
 5864:     ManyPorts = open_ports([]),
 5865:     ?P("[connector] length(ManyPorts): ~p", [length(ManyPorts)]),
 5866:     Tester ! {self(), sync},
 5867:     ?P("[connector] await continute from tester (~p)", [Tester]),
 5868:     receive {Tester, continue} -> timer:sleep(100) end,
 5869:     ?P("[connector] begin connecting"),
 5870:     ConnF =
 5871:         fun(Port) ->
 5872:                 case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, {127,0,0,1}, AccPort)) of
 5873:                     {ok, Sock} ->
 5874:                         ?P("[connector] success: "
 5875:                            "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
 5876:                         Sock;
 5877:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5878:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 5879:                     _Error ->
 5880:                         ?P("[connector] failure: "
 5881:                            "~n      ~p", [_Error]),
 5882:                         port_close(Port)
 5883:                 end
 5884:         end,
 5885:     R = [ConnF(Port) || Port <- lists:sublist(ManyPorts, 10)],
 5886:     ?P("[connector] await stop"),
 5887:     receive stop -> ?P("[connector] stop (~w)", [length(R)]), R end.
 5888: 
 5889: open_ports(L) ->
 5890:     case catch open_port({spawn_driver, "ram_file_drv"}, []) of
 5891: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 5892: 	    open_ports([Port|L]);
 5893: 	{'EXIT', {system_limit, _}} ->
 5894: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:split(5, L),
 5895: 	    [port_close(Port) || Port <- L1],
 5896: 	    L2
 5897:     end.
 5898: 
 5899: 
 5900: %% Check that active once and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5901: active_once_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5902:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5903:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5904:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5905:                             Addr;
 5906:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5907:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5908:                     end
 5909:            end,
 5910:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5911:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5912:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5913: 
 5914: do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5915:     Send = fun(Socket, Data) ->
 5916:                    case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 5917:                        {error, #{info := econnaborted}} ->
 5918:                            {error, econnaborted};
 5919:                        X ->
 5920:                            X
 5921:                    end
 5922:            end,
 5923:     ?P("stage 1"),
 5924:     (fun() ->
 5925: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin setup"),
 5926: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5927: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin send"),
 5928: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5929:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5930: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5931: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A, [{active,once}]),
 5932: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed"),
 5933: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5934: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5935: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5936: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5937: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5938: 	     ?P("[stage1] done"),
 5939: 	     ok
 5940:      end)(),
 5941:     ?P("stage 2"),
 5942:     (fun() ->
 5943: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin setup"),
 5944: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5945: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin send"),
 5946: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5947:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5948: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5949: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5950: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed"),
 5951: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5952: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5953: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5954: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5955: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5956: 	     ?P("[stage2] done"),
 5957: 	     ok
 5958:      end)(),
 5959:     ?P("stage 3"),
 5960:     (fun() ->
 5961: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin setup"),
 5962: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5963: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin send"),
 5964: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5965:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5966: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5967: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5968: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed"),
 5969: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5970: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5971: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5972: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5973: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5974: 	     ?P("[stage3] done"),
 5975: 	     ok
 5976:      end)(),
 5977:     ?P("stage 4"),
 5978:     (fun() ->
 5979: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin setup"),
 5980: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5981: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin send"),
 5982: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5983: 			fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5984: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5985: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5986: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed"),
 5987: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5988: 	     ?P("[stage4] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5989: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5990: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5991: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5992: 	     ?P("[stage4] done"),
 5993: 	     ok
 5994:      end)(),
 5995:     ?P("stage 5"),
 5996:     (fun() ->
 5997: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin setup"),
 5998: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5999: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin send"),
 6000: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 6001: 			fun() -> Send(A,"Hello") end),
 6002: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:false => expect success"),
 6003: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,false}]),
 6004: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed => expect timeout"),
 6005: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 6006: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:once => expect success"),
 6007: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 6008: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed"),
 6009: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 6010: 	     ?P("[stage5] done"),
 6011: 	     ok
 6012:      end)(),
 6013:     ?P("done"),
 6014:     ok.

 6016: %% Check that active n and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 6017: active_n_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6018:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6019:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6020:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6021:                             Addr;
 6022:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6023:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6024:                     end
 6025:            end,
 6026:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 6027:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6028:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6029: 
 6030: do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 6031:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 6032:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 6033: 
 6034:     P = self(),
 6035: 
 6036:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6037: 
 6038:     ClientF =
 6039:         fun() ->
 6040:                 ?P("[client] started"),
 6041:                 Payload = <<0:50000/unit:8>>,
 6042:                 Cnt = 10000,
 6043:                 ?P("[client] send size"),
 6044:                 P ! {size, Cnt * byte_size(Payload)},
 6045:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 6046:                 S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6047:                                   [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 6048:                         {ok, CS} ->
 6049:                             ?P("[client] connected"),
 6050:                             P ! {continue, self()},
 6051:                             CS;
 6052:                         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 6053:                             ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 6054:                     end,
 6055:                 ?P("[client] send payload"),
 6056:                 _ = [gen_tcp:send(S, Payload) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Cnt)],
 6057:                 ?P("[client] close socket"),
 6058:                 gen_tcp:close(S),
 6059:                 ?P("[client] done"),
 6060:                 exit(ok)
 6061:         end,
 6062:     ?P("create client process"),
 6063:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(ClientF),
 6064: 
 6065:     ?P("await size"),
 6066:     receive {size, SendSize} -> SendSize end,
 6067:     ?P("await continue or down"),
 6068:     receive
 6069:         {continue, Pid} ->
 6070:             ?P("got continue"),
 6071:             ok;
 6072:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 6073:             ?P("got *unexpected* skip"),
 6074:             gen_tcp:close(L),
 6075:             throw(SKIP);
 6076:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ConnectRes} ->
 6077:             ?P("got *unexpected* crash: "
 6078:               "~n   ~p", [ConnectRes]),
 6079:             exit({unexpected, connect, ConnectRes})
 6080:     end,
 6081:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6082:     inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6083:     ?P("start collecting data"),
 6084:     RecvSize = anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef),
 6085: 
 6086:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 6087:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 6088: 
 6089:     ?P("validate size"),
 6090:     if SendSize =:= RecvSize ->
 6091:             ?P("done"),
 6092:             ok;
 6093:        true ->
 6094:             ct:fail("Send and Recv size not equal: ~p ~p", [SendSize, RecvSize])
 6095:     end.
 6096: 
 6097: 
 6098: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef) ->
 6099:     anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, 0, false, false).
 6100: 
 6101: anc_await_closed_and_down(_S, _Pid, _MRef, Size, true, true) ->
 6102:     Size;
 6103: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down) ->
 6104:     receive
 6105:         {tcp, S, Bin} ->
 6106:             %% ?P("got a chunk (~w) of data", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 6107:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef,
 6108:                                       byte_size(Bin) + Size, Closed, Down);
 6109:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 6110:             ?P("got closed -> we are done: ~w", [Size]),
 6111:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, true, Down);
 6112:         {tcp_passive, S} ->
 6113:             %% ?P("got passive -> active"),
 6114:             inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6115:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6116:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ok} ->
 6117:             ?P("Received expected down message regarding client"),
 6118:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6119: 
 6120:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 6121:             ?P("Received UNEXPECTED down message regarding client:"
 6122:                "~n   Reason:    ~p"
 6123:                "~n   Port Info: ~p",
 6124:                [Reason, (catch erlang:port_info(S))]),
 6125:             ct:fail({unexpected_client_down, Reason}); 
 6126: 
 6127:        Msg ->
 6128:             ?P("ignore: ~p", [Msg]),
 6129:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down)
 6130:     end.
 6131: 
 6132: 
 6133: send_timeout_cfg(Config) ->
 6134:     send_timeout_cfg(Config, default).
 6135: 
 6136: send_timeout_cfg(Config, Case) ->
 6137:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6138:         true when (Case =:= send_timeout_check_length) ->
 6139:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   5*1024};
 6140:         true ->
 6141:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 10*1024),  5*1024};
 6142:         false ->
 6143:             {1,   1000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   16*1024}
 6144:     end.    
 6145: 
 6146: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6147: send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6148:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6149:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6150:                    ?P("create node"),
 6151:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6152: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6153:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6154:            end,
 6155:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6156:                    do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6157:            end,
 6158:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6159:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6160:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6161:            end,
 6162:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6163: 
 6164: do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6165:     ?P("begin"),
 6166:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6167:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6168: 		       false, RNode),
 6169:     ?P("done"),
 6170:     ok.
 6171: 
 6172: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6173: send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6174:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6175:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6176:                    ?P("create node"),
 6177:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6178: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6179:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6180:            end,
 6181:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6182:                    do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6183:            end,
 6184:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6185:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6186:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6187:            end,
 6188:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6189: 
 6190: do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6191:     ?P("begin"),
 6192:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6193:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose),
 6194:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6195: 		       true, RNode),
 6196:     ?P("done"),
 6197:     ok.
 6198: 
 6199: send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6200: 		   AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6201:     ?P("[basic] sink"),
 6202:     {A, Pid}              = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6203:                                                Addr, SndTimeout,
 6204:                                                AutoClose, SndBuf),
 6205:     Send                  = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6206:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout),
 6207: 
 6208:     %% Check that the socket is not busy/closed...
 6209:     ?P("[basic] verify socket not busy/closed"),
 6210:     case gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) of
 6211: 	{error, Reason} ->
 6212: 	    ?P("[basic] (expected) send failure"),
 6213: 	    after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason),
 6214: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6215: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6216: 	    ok;
 6217: 	ok ->
 6218:             %% Note that there is no active reader on the other end,
 6219:             %% so a 'channel' has been filled, should remain filled.
 6220: 	    ?P("[basic] UNEXPECTED send success"),
 6221: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6222: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6223: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected send success")
 6224:     end.
 6225: 
 6226: 
 6227: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6228: send_timeout_check_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6229:     Cond = fun() ->
 6230:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6231:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6232:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6233:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6234:                        _ ->
 6235:                            ok
 6236:                    end
 6237:            end,
 6238:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6239:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6240:                    ?P("create node"),
 6241:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6242: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6243:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6244:            end,
 6245:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6246:                    do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, Node)
 6247:            end,
 6248:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6249:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6250:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6251:            end,
 6252:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6253: 
 6254: do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6255:     ?P("begin"),
 6256:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6257:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_check_length),
 6258: 
 6259:     %% Check timeout length.
 6260:     ?P("spawn sink process (check timeout length)"),
 6261:     Self = self(),
 6262:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 6263:                    fun() ->
 6264:                            {A, _} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6265: 						       Addr, SndTimeout,
 6266:                                                        true, SndBuf),
 6267:                            Send = fun() ->
 6268:                                           %% <TMP>
 6269:                                           %% snmp:enable_trace(),
 6270:                                           %% snmp:set_trace([{gen_tcp_socket,
 6271:                                           %%                  [{scope, send}]},
 6272:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,getopt}]},
 6273:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,send}]}],
 6274:                                           %%                [{timestamp, true},
 6275:                                           %%                 {return_trace, true}]),
 6276:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 6277:                                           Res = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6278:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 6279:                                           %% snmp:disable_trace(),
 6280:                                           %% </TMP>
 6281:                                           Self ! Res,
 6282:                                           Res
 6283:                                   end,
 6284:                            {{error, timeout}, _} =
 6285: 			       timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)
 6286:                    end),
 6287:     Diff = get_max_diff(Pid),
 6288:     ?P("Max time for send: ~p", [Diff]),
 6289:     true = (Diff > (SndTimeout - 500)) and (Diff < (SndTimeout + 500)),
 6290: 
 6291:     %% Wait for the process to die.
 6292:     ?P("await (timeout checker) process death"),
 6293:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, _} -> ok end,
 6294: 
 6295:     ?P("done"),
 6296:     ok.
 6297: 
 6298: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6299: send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6300:     Cond = fun() ->
 6301:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6302:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6303:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6304:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6305:                        _ ->
 6306:                            ok
 6307:                    end
 6308:            end,
 6309:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6310:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6311:                    ?P("create node"),
 6312:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6313: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6314:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6315:            end,
 6316:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6317:                    do_send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6318: 	   end,
 6319:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6320:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6321:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6322:            end,
 6323:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6324: 
 6325: do_send_timeout_para_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6326:     ?P("begin"),
 6327:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6328: 
 6329:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6330:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6331:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6332: 		      false, RNode),
 6333: 
 6334:     ?P("done"),
 6335:     ok.
 6336: 
 6337: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6338: %% send_timeout/send_timeout_close behaves differently on 
 6339: %% inet_backend 'socket' (compared to inet), so we skip
 6340: %% this test case (until we can re-write).
 6341: send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6342:     Cond = fun() ->
 6343:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6344:                        true ->
 6345:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6346:                        false ->
 6347:                            Key = kernel_factor,
